cmdList.name: Add Song
cmdList.description:
Adds any attached audio files to the local music library. 
Adding 'force' force will overwrite existing songs with same name. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Add Sound
cmdList.description:
Adds any attached audio files to the local sound library. 
Adding 'force' argument will overwrite existing sounds with same name. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: About
cmdList.description: Displays bot information.

cmdList.name: Console
cmdList.description: Executes command in console.

cmdList.name: Help
cmdList.description: Displays a list of available commands.

cmdList.name: Pause
cmdList.description: Pauses audio playback.

cmdList.name: Play
cmdList.description:
Plays audio from the provided YouTube video URL or searches Google Play Music for query and starts playback of best track result. 
Resumes paused playback if no arguments are provided.

cmdList.name: Play Music
cmdList.description:
Plays specific or random song matching provided search criteria. 
'?' lists songs matching search criteria.

cmdList.name: Play Sound
cmdList.description:
Plays specific or random sound matching provided search criteria. 
'?' lists sounds matching search criteria.

cmdList.name: Purge Music
cmdList.description:
Removes all songs from the local library. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Purge Sounds
cmdList.description:
Removes all sounds from the local library. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Resume
cmdList.description: Resumes paused audio playback.

cmdList.name: Remove Song
cmdList.description:
Deletes a song from the local library. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Remove Sound
cmdList.description:
Deletes a sound from the local library. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Set Bot Activity
cmdList.description:
Sets the bot's currently displayed activity. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Set Bot Avatar
cmdList.description:
Sets the bot's avatar to 'avatar.png' in the assets folder. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Set Bot Status
cmdList.description:
Sets the bot's status. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Show User Sounds
cmdList.description:
Lists users with their user sounds. 
*Admin Command*

cmdList.name: Song Info
cmdList.description: Displays information about a song.

cmdList.name: Sound Info
cmdList.description: Displays information about a sound

cmdList.name: Stop
cmdList.description: Stops audio playback on voice channel.

cmdList.name: Update Music
cmdList.description:
Attempts to add all files in ./music folder to the local library under their filenames. Removes any songs not found on disk from the library. Does not overwrite. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: Update Sounds
cmdList.description:
Attempts to add all files in ./sounds folder to the local library under their filenames. Removes any sounds not found on disk from the library. Does not overwrite. 
*Manager Command*

cmdList.name: YouTube Download
cmdList.description: Provides download links for the YouTube video at the URL provided.

aboutBot:
Greetings! I am ALVIS (Asynchronous Learning Virtual Intelligence System); a custom management and utility bot. I am currently under development by [PacketCloudâ„¢](https://packetcloud.com). 
My code is available on [GitHub](https://github.com/packetcloud/alvis). 

Please put up with my bugs, as I am still in development.

You can **@mention** or **DM** me for assistance, or type `!help` for a list of functionality.
overheardNameResponse:
I heard my name! 
Anything I can do to help? 

*@mention or DM me to get my attention.*
